Lejligheden lejes ud til en enkelt person. Det er tilladt at invitere andre personer over til en kop te eller middag osv., men det er vigtigt, at man overholder aftalen om, at kun en enkelt person overnatter i lejligheden, da man ellers bryder ejendommens regler og husorden for korttidsfremleje.

(English description)

I will be travelling and am offering my super cosy apartment with a fantastic location in the heart of Christianshavn for a 1 month sublet to a single guests - preferably a vegan or vegetarian as this is a vegetarian home. Please note that this is a short term holiday sublet.

The apartment is located on the 1st floor and consists of a combined living/bedroom, a kitchen with a small dining table, and a very small Copenhagen wet room style bathroom with a handheld shower. The apartment is furnished, and duvet/pillow, bed linen, towels, and dish towels are available. Pets are not allowed. Smoking is not allowed. Parties and events are not allowed. 

The apartment will be rented out to a single guest. It is allowed to invite other people over for a cup of tea or dinner, etc., but it is very important to follow the agreement that only one person stays overnight in the apartment, as otherwise, you will violate the building's rules and regulations for short-term subletting.

Period: 10.05.2025 â€“ 10.06.2025 (1 month)

Rent: 6750 kr. (for 1 month) including gas, electricity, water, heating, and internet.
Deposit: 1000 kr.

The rent and deposit must be paid when we agree on the sublet. 

The ad will be deleted once I have found a subtenant.

// English

NOTE: The images are of a similar residence and property in Carlsberg Byen. The floor plan is accurate.

An exclusive, newly built, and spacious 2-room apartment is now available for rent in the popular Carlsberg Byen, located in HÃ¸ffings TÃ¥rn.

The apartment features an optimal layout, making full use of every square meter. Upon entering, you step into the kitchen area, which has space for a dining table. The kitchen, designed by HTH, has a sleek and minimalist aesthetic with a handleless design, a white countertop, and built-in appliances from Miele. From the kitchen and dining area, you have direct access to the apartmentâ€™s French balcony with a folding doorâ€”or through the bedroomâ€”allowing you to enjoy a view of the rest of Copenhagen.

The kitchen flows seamlessly into the living room, which is set back from the entrance, creating depth and a natural flow throughout the apartment. Adjacent to the living room, you will find the bedroom.
The bathroom is designed with drawer modules, a laundry tower (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and a sink in artificial marble from Marmorline. The walls and floors of the bathroom are adorned with pastel green Mosa tiles.
Overall, this apartment is executed in a minimalist and Nordic style, with great attention to aesthetics. The flooring consists of white-pigmented, lacquered oak planks from BOEN, featuring underfloor heating throughout the entire apartment. The fixtures are from Grohe, and all appliances are from Miele.

Included in the apartment: All appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, and cooktop.

Included in the property: Basement storage, bicycle storage, and a courtyard area. Parking spaces are available for rent.

title: FULLY FURNISHED 3 BEDROOM APARTMENT FOR RENT FOR 1 YEAR FROM JULY 2025
description:
The apartment is located in the best location in Copenhagen right by Enghave Plads in Vesterbro. 

It is ideal for a couple and includes a bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen and bath. The apartment is 86 m2. 

The apartment will be available from 1 July 2025 (earlier takeover can be arranged) and for a period of 12 months with the possibility to extend with 1-2 months. 

It is located in the loveliest area of Copenhagen surrounded by cafes and green areas with easy access to the city center. 

The rent + all utilities is DKK 19.800 a month. A deposit of DKK 51.000 is required beforehand.

title: Apartment available in the inner city of Copenhagen
description:
Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, StrÃ¸get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 13,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also You write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

Now you can rent a lovely 1-bedroom apartment in SÃ¸borg!

Project Radio on Gyngemose Parkvej in SÃ¸borg, formerly known as DR's TV-Byen, has been transformed into an attractive residential area with modern 1-bedroom apartments. No student ID is required to rent these units â€“ they are available to everyone.

----

Great apartment with magnificent views of Kongens Have (park)

Do you dream of living in an amazing apartment where historical charm meets modern comfort? This impressive 190 mÂ² apartment is located in a historic property in the middle of Copenhagen, and offers the perfect combination of classic elegance and modern functionality.
The apartment is located in the popular street SÃ¸lvgade, right next to Kongens Have â€“ one of Copenhagenâ€™s most beautiful green oases. Here you are close to everything Copenhagen has to offer, while at the same time enjoying the peace and quiet that the area around Kongens Have offers.
The property has been carefully renovated, and the exterior restoration includes, among other things, a beautiful new roof in Valisian slate, which supports the buildingâ€™s historical value. Inside, the apartment has been modernized with great respect for the original details, which have been restored so that they retain their period charm, while the apartment also meets todayâ€™s demands for comfort and functionality.
The apartment offers an impressive and airy atmosphere, where original elements such as beautiful stucco and elegant details go hand in hand with modern solutions. The spacious  dining room is the center of the apartment, and two additional living rooms provide ample opportunity for decoration and activities. One living room can easily be used as an extra bedroom.
The apartment has three additional bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen with dining area, a small pantry and a spacious bathroom with shower, washer and dryer. Good insulation of the property ensures a good indoor climate and low energy costs.
This apartment is ideal for those who appreciate historical details and elegant decoration, but at the same time want to live in a home that meets modern requirements.

ENGLISH VERSION
Charming 2-Room Apartment near Amagerbrogade
In order to be closer to my workplace during my postgraduate medical training, I am renting out my apartment for the coming year.

A bit about the apartment:â€¨
The apartment includes an entrance hall. From here, you have access to a cozy and spacious living room featuring a New Yorker wall, decorative ceiling molding, and light wooden floors. In addition to the living room, the apartment has a bedroom facing the courtyard. The apartment also offers a neat and bright kitchen with plenty of cabinet space. Lastly, there's a nice bathroom with a separate shower. A loft storage space is available for use during the rental period. A washing machine and dryer are located on the kitchen stairway and are shared with the neighbor. The building also has a charming backyard where you can enjoy your afternoon coffee. The apartment is rented out unfurnished.

A bit about the area:â€¨
The apartment is located on a quiet side street off Amagerbrogade in Copenhagen S, Amager, close to cafÃ©s and shopping options. It's situated 2.7 km from the center of Copenhagen and about 950 meters from the nearest metro stations: Lergravsparken and Amagerbro. Bus 5C stops just 20 meters from the apartment. For those with a car, resident parking is available in the area.

Size: 57 sqm consisting of: 2 rooms, an entrance hall, kitchen, and bathroomâ€¨Rent: DKK 11,000/month excluding utilitiesâ€¨
Utilities: Approx. DKK 700 (Water & Heating)â€¨
Deposit: 3 months' rentâ€¨
Rental period: Move-in is possible from the beginning of May, and the rental period is initially one year (possibly with the option of extension). Up to 2 CPR registrations are allowed at the address.

title: Super nice 2-room apartment in Frederiksberg C -Expats only
description:
The apartment is located at a highly sought after address in Frederiksberg. The apartment can be rented for 1-2 years. No Pets!
The apartment is on the 4th floor. There is access to the apartment via a closed gate and the beautiful courtyard environment. There is an elevator!
The apartment is a large 2 bedroom apartment of 86 m2 and offers a distribution entrance with built-in closets and space for outerwear. From the hallway there is a newer, nice bathroom. The bathroom is in a good size with underfloor heating, shower, built-in IFÃ– hanging toilet and with washer and dryer.
The apartment has a state-of-the-art kitchen living room with the most delicious appliances as well as Quooker Fusion and wine refrigerator.
The apartment has a nice large living room, where there is plenty of space for both dining area and sofa area. From the living room there is access to the balcony with plenty of space to sit and enjoy the afternoon and evening sun.
Furthermore, there is a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes.
There are two balconies â€“ one to the northeast at the entrance to the apartment and one to the southwest.
Aconto consumption:
Heating: 560 DKK pr. month
Water: 260 DKK per. month
Internet: 250 DKK pr. month
Broadband is installed via wireless modem from Yousee. The subscription can be taken over.
The apartment is NOT for sharing!! When contacting, please note your phone number !!

The area: Holger Danskes Vej is located centrally in Frederiksberg, close to all the good shopping opportunities, the atmospheric cafe life and the many coffee bars on Falkoner Alle and GodthÃ¥bsvej as well as walking distance to means of transport such as bus and Aksel MÃ¸llers Have Metro. In addition, close distance to Frederiksberg Center and the cozy Agricultural University Garden â€“ a small oasis in the busy city life. Here you will live in a quiet, green and at the same time central area with a short walking distance to virtually all daily necessities. Holger Danskeâ€™s road itself is a quiet road, planted with trees and good parking opportunities. The road is quietly located with one-way traffic.
You can cycle to the metro in five minutes and to the center of Copenhagen in ten minutes. BUS 2A runs towards RÃ¥dhuspladsen, and there is a five-minute walk to the bus stop.

Welcome to Rebekkavej.
When architect Christian Benthein designed Rebekkavej in 1902 - he designed it for himself and his family! 
Everywhere there are beautiful details and a fantastic light.

The mansion apartment is located on the entire 1st floor of the property with only 3 apartments. 
Rebekkavej is perfectly and quietly located, within walking distance to an international nursery, kindergarten, shopping and close to international schools and not least the 4 minutes to Hellerup Station which, with its many S-trains and regional trains, ensures that you are effectively connected to Copenhagen city center and the airport in only 30 minutes.

The apartment contains: Large and bright dining room with bay window, living room with access to a large private roof terrace, 5 bedrooms, 2 newer bathrooms with underfloor heating (both with toilet, one with bathtub and one with shower), modern open kitchen with newer stove and extractor hood. The large "American fridge" with cold water and ice cubes is the icing on the cake.

Optimal division into parents and "children's section" with their own bathroom. Separate laundry room with new washing column and office/guest or aupair room with its own exit.
Many beautiful details and high ceilings. There is a shared garden with exclusive use of its own sunny terrace. The apartment also has storage space in the attic.

title: MYLO LIVING - New apartment close to M4
description:
Fully furnished studio apartment (newbuild) to be sublet for 10-12 months to a single person or a couple (no friends/sharing, pets or children).  CPR is possible during the period. There are laundry and fitness rooms as well as a shared kitchen space, a lounge and work area and roof terrace available for all residents.

Rent period: 1 July 2025 - 30 April 2026 (10 months) + 1 May 2026 - 30 June 2026 (another optional 2 months).

Apartment is located 500 meters from Sluseholmen Metro and Mozarts Plads Metro. Buses 8A, 17, 19 and 23 are very close by. Sydhavn St. S-train is 750 meters away. Aalborg University Copenhagen is just across the road. 

There are various grocery and convenience stores within walking distance, along with restaurants and cafes. 

OBS! There is no basement storage area available.

***Non-smokers only please***

title: Do you dream of living in the vibrant Vesterbro?
description:
Do you dream of living in the vibrant Vesterbro? Discover the charm of Vesterbro in this beautiful, partially furnished 3-room apartment covering 84 sqm, situated on the raised ground floor. The apartment masterfully combines classic Copenhagen allure with modern conveniences and an attractive location in the heart of a bustling urban area.

Enjoy life in two spacious, connected living rooms that naturally come together to form a large, open living space with plenty of room for both daily life and entertaining guests. This unique feature adds an open and welcoming atmosphere to the home, encouraging social gatherings.

The kitchen brims with charm and is equipped with everything you need: a stove, oven, washing machine, and microwave â€“ perfect for cooking and cozy dinners. The classic Copenhagen bathroom has been completely renovated, blending timeless elegance with contemporary comfort.

The apartment is taken over partially furnished (see more below), offering you a unique opportunity to put your personal touch on the home while enjoying the furnishings already available.

Located in the sought-after Vesterbro, you are placed in the heart of Copenhagen with immediate access to the city's many offerings. From cozy cafes and unique shops to a wide range of cultural experiences â€“ everything is within walking distance.

- Location: Vesterbro, Copenhagen â€“ raised ground floor.
- Size: 84 sqm, 3 rooms. Not suitable for sharing.
- Facilities: Classic Copenhagen bathroom (completely renovated), charming kitchen with stove, oven, washing machine, and microwave, partially furnished.
- Special features: Two connected living rooms, modern facilities, light and open atmosphere.
- Partially furnished: Bed, 2 chest of drawers, closet, table and chairs, pc table and chair, sofa. More information upon showing. 

A few key points about the rental:
* The rental period is limited to a maximum of two years, as Iâ€™ll be away temporarily.
* Utilities (water, heat, gas, internet) summise to 1674 kr. monthly, with water, heat, and electricity depending on use (so money back if you use less or pay additional if you use a lot). So far Iâ€™ve always gotten money back on heat and water each year. 
* Subletting or shared tenancy is not allowed without written permission.
* No pets are allowed â€“ including small companion animals.
* Smoking is not permitted in the apartment, and Iâ€™m specifically looking for a non-smoker.
* The wood-burning stove may not be used.
* The apartment is rented out partially furnished, and the furniture may not be removed without agreement.
* Drilling into bathroom tiles or decorative stucco is not allowed, and the apartmentâ€™s current wall colors must be respected unless otherwise agreed.

If youâ€™re still interested, Iâ€™d appreciate it if you could share a bit more about yourself:
* What is your current housing situation, and why are you looking for a new place?
* Would you be living by yourself or are you more that will be living together?
* When would you ideally move in, and how long are you looking to stay?
* What do you do for work, and is the rent within your budget?
* Are you comfortable with the apartment being partially furnished?
* Do you have an special needs, expectations or questions to the apartment I should know?

title: Nice sunny apartment with private parking
description:
Elegant, modern and furnished two bedroom apartment with south facing panoramic windows for rent. The apartment is placed on the second floor in a beautiful and well-maintained building with private parking and elevator by renowned architects, Schmidt Hammer Lassen. The whole apartment complex is secured by private surveillance cameras.

There are build-in closets in the hallway, a spacious living area with kitchen and dining area and a spacious bathroom with washer and dryer. The apartment boasts two bedrooms with plenty of closet space. One of the bedrooms is currently used as a home office but can be refurnished into a second bedroom if so desired. 
The apartment is very well planned out and suitable for one person or a couple. It is located within walking distance from the historical city center, either along the harbour at Langelinje by the little mermaid or through the beautiful and green area of the Citadel. 

100 meters from the apartment you find an excellent fitness studio, an artisan bakery and a grocery store. Ã˜sterport station is located just 200 meters away with both train and metro connections.

Beautiful apartment with sunny balcony for rent in Copenhagen.
Here you can live in the middle of nature and in the middle of the city in this delicious 3-room apartment with lots of light and green views.
The apartment is centrally located in Ã˜restad City, near the City Park, shopping opportunities, charming water canals, cafe and restaurants. The nearest neighbor is the large scenic Kalvebod FÃ¦lled, where birds of prey soar and cows graze. The metro takes you to Copenhagen City Center in 10 minutes, and you can walk to Scandinavia's largest shopping center, Fields, in 5 minutes. The gatehouse was designed by the young Danish design studio Holgaard Architects and built in 2007. Everything is of high quality. The kitchen is in pure luxury from German Bulthaup and equipped with appliances from Gaggenau. All doors are with handles designed by the English super designer Jasper Morisson. The bathroom is equipped with Philippe Starck and has i.a. large special shower with waterfall. In addition, Siemens washbasin, dark wood table and tiles from Evers. Other floors are matt lacquered oak parquet from Boen. Designed blinds from Botex are installed in all rooms. There is underfloor heating throughout. The apartment has inlaid fiber net, large windows and a formidable view in all rooms as well as nice and presentable staircase with elevator. 

There is a time limit for the lease of 3.5 years, as we want to sell the apartment someday. It is of course possible to move out earlier if the tenant wishes. 
The monthly consumption expenses on account are 800 kr. Showings/open house events are held continuously until the apartment is rented. 
Call or write if you would like a showing.

Exclusive apartment with two Balconies and sea views

Nordhavn is a unique blend of modern urbanity and maritime surroundings, where you can enjoy both the city's pulse and the sea. With itâ€™s modern design and two balconies - you have the opportunity to enjoy both the sea view and the peaceful atmosphere of the well-designed courtyard.

The apartment is rented out fully furnished from July 15. If you prefer your own furniture, it can also be rented unfurnished.
The apartment features a spacious bedroom with built-in closets, an office, and an open, modern kitchen in dark smoked oak. From here, you can enjoy views of the sea and step out onto one of the two spacious balconies. The bathroom is stylish and functional with a shower and a washer/dryer unit, and the entrance area also offers great wardrobe space. Throughout the apartment, there are light herringbone parquet floors.

The apartment is located in Nordhavn, where you will find many cafÃ©s, restaurants and shops. Along the harbor basin, well-designed promenades there are excellent opportunities for all-year swimming.
KronlÃ¸bsÃ¸en was completed in 2023 as an entirely new island in Nordhavn. Itâ€™s design was inspired by the geological formations of MÃ¸ns Klint, which is reflected in the use of materials and the distinctive balcony structures.

Beneath KronlÃ¸bsÃ¸en, there is a multi-story underground parking garage with electric charging options, and two Metro stations are just a few minutesâ€™ walk from the apartment.

Rent this unique apartment and experience what itâ€™s like to live with the water as your neighbor in one of Copenhagenâ€™s most exciting areas.

title: Top shelf apartment with stunning views
description:
One of the best uninterrupted views over Copenhagen and the canal. This 8th floor apartment offers a generous 116 m2 living space split in two spacious bedrooms, a practical hallway, a huge open kitchen and living room, one large bathroom and a guest toilet. 

Quality and a balance with nature is key themes for this new modern building. Among other this results in a joinery kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures and hard wood oak herringbone floors. To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 34 m2 balcony with large, planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

A complimentary private underground parking spot is also available upon request. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

The building was finalized in March 2023, which is why some of the pictures are illustrations only. However, we have also added a video. 

We are renting the apartment out until Oct. 31. 2025 while we are working abroad. 

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

Bright and inviting apartment centrally located on Frederiksberg

Welcome to this unique, two-level apartment located at the top of a nice, newer property on Gammel Kongevej. With its consistent style, large amounts of light and impressive layout, this apartment is an ideal home for both families and couples who want to live centrally in Frederiksberg.

title: Central Frederiksberg with your own beautiful garden
description:
Situated on the same street as some of Frederiksbergs most popular cafes, close to metro, shopping and groceries, this spacious parterre apartment is one of two large apartments in a 19th century beautiful villa with high ceilings and oak parquet floors.
 
This apartment offers a hall, 3 bedrooms, a huge living room (45 sqm), winter garden, eat-in kitchen and large bathroom with a tub and a separate shower room. 
In addition a fully equipped laundry room and two storage rooms in the basement. 

From the winter garden a small staircase leads down to the calm, charming garden with old fruit trees such as figs, plums and apples, and a fantastic magnolia tree. The garden exclusively belongs to the parterre apartment. 

Around the corner is the entrance to Frederiksberg Have, one of Copenhagens most beautiful parks, and a few steps away is a new underground parking facility, free for residents of Frederiksberg, opening in spring 2025. 

This apartment is perfect for a couple perhaps with 1-2 children, looking for spacious and presentable  living quarters in the city.

Fra vinterhaven fÃ¸rer en lille trappe ned til den rolige, charmerende have med gamle frugttrÃ¦er som figner, blommer og Ã¦bler og et fantastisk magnoliatrÃ¦. Haven hÃ¸rer eksklusivt til parterrelejligheden.

title: Furnished Studio - Ideal for young professionals -  300m from Metro
description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. 

This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligstÃ¸tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
â€£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
â€£ Desk 
â€£ Storage cabinet 
â€£ Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood) 
â€£ Private bathroom with shower 

Free access to community amenities: 
â€£ Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms 
â€£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
â€£ Atrium with cozy community atmosphere 
â€£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
â€£ Located in UMEUS Valby, part of the new Torveporten area 
â€£ Proximity to KÃ¸benhavn Syd Metro (less than 300 meters away) - 15 min to Copenhagen Central Station by metro 
â€£ FÃ¸tex supermarket 120m away from your doorstep 
â€£ Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas 
â€£ Easy access to the city center (15 min away by metro) and nearby Frederiksberg 
â€£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark'sâ€™ biggest cities: Odense, Ã…rhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
â€£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
â€£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life â€“ here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ğŸ¤ğŸ  Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and VÃ¦rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and RÃ¥dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligstÃ¸tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

â€£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
â€£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
â€£ Loft with bed 
â€£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
â€£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
â€£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
â€£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
â€£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
â€£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
â€£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
â€£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
â€£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
â€£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on BÃ¼lowsvej 
â€£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
â€£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
â€£ Restaurants, parks, cafÃ©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
â€£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
â€£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life â€“ here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ğŸ¤ğŸ  Reach out to arrange a viewing!

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

description:
Located in the heart of Christianshavnâ€™s charming canal district, this tastefully furnished 113 mÂ² apartment offers the perfect blend of historic charm and modern convenience.

Step into a spacious, light-filled home featuring a welcoming hallway, a large open-plan living and dining area with a fully equipped kitchen, a sleek bathroom with underfloor heating, a generous master bedroom, and a versatile office that doubles as a guest room. 

Thoughtfully decorated with tasteful furnishings, the apartment is move-in ready and includes all modern appliances: washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, fridge, freezer, oven, hob, microwave and TV. 

A private storage room just outside the entrance provides easy access and extra space, and the building is serviced by a lift for added convenience.

Ideally situated just minutes from the metro and multiple bus routes, the apartment offers seamless connectivity: only 12 minutes to Copenhagen Airport and 3 minutes to Kongens Nytorv. 

Despite its central location, the property is tucked away in a peaceful development, offering a quiet retreat within walking distance of Christianshavnâ€™s vibrant cafÃ©s, restaurants, and cultural attractions.

This apartment is perfect for professionals or couples seeking stylish city living in one of Copenhagenâ€™s most desirable neighbourhoods.

description:

From the moment you step inside, you will experience a sense of quality, spaciousness, and exclusivity.

This apartment is conveniently located close to the metro station (Havneholmen), shopping options (such as Fisketorvet), and cozy cafÃ©s.

The breathtaking view extends down the canals, over the cityâ€™s rooftops, and directly towards the historic warehouse. Natural light floods the space, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. The surrounding area is fully developed, featuring elegant wooden structures along the waterfront, boat docks, lush maritime landscaping, and numerous recreational spots.

The apartment offers a well-designed 93 square meters, starting with a spacious entrance hall that flows seamlessly into the bright open-plan kitchen and living area, with room for a large dining table and sofa arrangement.

The kitchen is both stylish and practical, with ample cabinet space for optimal storage, light-colored fronts, and a sleek countertop.

Adjacent to the living room is one of the two bedrooms, featuring a large built-in wardrobe and enough space for a double bed and a home office setup. The second bedroom is located at the corner of the apartment and has direct access to the west- and north-facing balcony, where you can enjoy stunning sunsets and warm summer evenings.

Both bedrooms are generously sized, allowing for flexible furnishing options, and each boasts floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows with exceptional views of the canals.

The bathroom is in line with the rest of the apartmentâ€”modern and spacious, with a wall-mounted toilet, a large shower area, and a combined washer/dryer.

The apartment features beautiful light-colored plank flooring and, of course, underfloor heating throughout.

All in all, a wonderful apartment close to the city center, set in beautiful and relaxing surroundings.

description:
This beautifully designed apartment is available for rent either partially furnished or unfurnished, depending on your preference. The lease period is for 12 months with the potential for a lease extension.

Located in the preserved Mineral Water Factory building from the 1920s, the apartment is part of Carlsberg City's transformation into a vibrant residential area. The renovation process adhered to strict architectural standards, leading to the selection of Dorte Mandrup Architects to design the 20 new apartments.

At the top of the building, you'll be welcomed by a charming, landscaped atrium courtyard, where your private terrace is situated right in front of the apartment. Stepping inside, you'll find polished concrete floors and a joiner kitchen, featuring a kitchen island and solid Miele appliances. Next to the kitchen is a spacious and bathroom, complete with toilet, shower, and a combined washer and dryer unit.

The open-plan living area is perfect for both dining and relaxation, with access to the buildingâ€™s shared polishing platform. On the upper mezzanine level, you will be greeted by solid oak plank flooring, high ceilings, and a bright, airy atmosphere â€” ideal for a bedroom or home office.

The home features underfloor heating throughout the whole flat, and also the possibility to rent a parking space in the basement with EV charging. This flat combines the charm of a historic building with granite plinth and the like, while also offering the convenience of a modern one.

title: Apartment in central and hip NÃ¸rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant NÃ¸rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. Youâ€™ll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of NÃ¸rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: KÃ¸lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. The apartment is tucked away on a side street off Rantzausgade, ensuring you wonâ€™t be disturbed by any noise during your stay. Plus, with SÃ¸erne, Frederiksberg, and Vesterbro just a short walk away, youâ€™ll be right in the middle of it all. You can even complete the "Copenhagen experience" by borrowing a bike just around the corner!

I love helping my guests have the best experience, so feel free to ask me anything! I'm a passionate traveler myself, and the only thing I ask is that you take good care of this beautiful apartment while enjoying your stay!

title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.
address: 16. februar, Ordrupvej, 2920 KÃ¸benhavn, Charlottenlund  - 1. sal

title: Two-room apartment, plus communal spaces
description:
A lovely fully-furnished two-room apartment with NoLi Residences. Super convenient to move into, since everything you need is provided, from  crockery and a kettle to bedding and towels. Suitable for two. 

There are workspaces, meeting rooms, and a communal space with a kitchen which can be booked for events, free of charge. There are various classes e.g. yoga/pilates etc. running on a weekly basis for residents to join for a fee. 

Amager Faelled (nature reserve) is situated just behind â€” perfect for biking, running or just taking a Sunday stroll during sunset. There are also plenty of playgrounds to occupy the kids. Itâ€™s a really international area which has a friendly vibe. Itâ€™s a 10-minute walk to Vestamager metro and 20 minutes to Fields shopping centre on foot. 

Please note, I am the current tenant and happy to do a viewing via FaceTime or in-person.  
Ideal move in date: 15th March, alternatively 1st April. 

Contracts available range from 1 to 8 months, with the possibility to extend. 
An 8-month stay is 17.580,

*AVAILABLE FROM 1st of June 2025*

WHY THE APARTMENT
If you want to live centrally in Carlsberg Byen, CPH, with a fantastic view and tranquility from the 25th floor, this apartment could be perfect for you. Located in HÃ¸ffdings Tower, this exclusive 2-room apartment spans 62 mÂ², plus a 2 mÂ² balcony. The apartment faces east/south, providing perfect conditions to enjoy sunrises over Ã˜resund and views of central Copenhagen. It maintains a comfortable temperature in the afternoon and evening, with the view preserved without sun-blocking curtains.

The apartment has an optimal layout, utilizing every square meter. The entrance leads to an open kitchen from HTH with a minimalist design, white countertop, and Miele appliances. From the kitchen, you enter the living room, which is set back from the entrance. The living room leads to the bedroom with access to a French balcony with folding doors.

The bathroom features drawer modules, a laundry column (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and an artificial marble sink from Marmorline. The fixtures are from Grohe, and the appliances are from Miele.

The apartment is designed in a minimalist Nordic style with white-pigmented lacquered oak floors and underfloor heating. Under the building, there is a parking basement with the option to rent a parking space, as well as storage rooms, a bicycle basement, and a courtyard.

WHY CARLSBERG BYEN
Carlsberg City, nestled between Frederiksberg, Valby, and Vesterbro, offers a unique blend of urban life, historic architecture, and green spaces. With extensive parks, multiple and diverse dining options, grocery shopping, gym and much more, itâ€™s designed for an active and convenient place to live in Copenhagen.
Popular among internationals, this vibrant district is family-friendly, hosting a European school and offering convenient commuting options and it is just 10 minutes by bike from the city center. Residents also enjoy easy access to offices outside Copenhagen, with the train/metro station a short 5-minute walk away from the apartment.

title: Exceptionally well located apartment in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor!
description:
Welcome to Herluf Trolles Gade!

For dansk tekst; se sidst i annoncen.

Here you will find an apartment in a class of its own, measuring 159 square meters, and is located in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor in what can be described as one of Copenhagen's most central and best locations. This provides an astonishing amenity value.

The apartment has been modernized, and has a stately feel.

You enter a large entrance hall where there are two smaller storage rooms for storing outerwear or anything else that needs to be put away.

From the entrance you can access a large bathroom with separate shower. In addition, from the entrance there is access to a very extraordinary utility room, which contains closet space, sink and washer and dryer.

In the second part of the apartment, there is a large kitchen, located in an orval room, where there is plenty of space to place a large dining table. Next, the apartment has two large living rooms, one of which can optimally be used as a sofa room, and the other as a dining room. Both rooms are located with a view of the wonderful Copenhagen harbor, and have a fantastic light.

Finally, the apartment has two large bedrooms, where there is plenty of space to have a bed, closets, desk, etc. One bedroom is located overlooking Copenhagen's harbor.

This is a fantastic apartment, which is some of the absolute best Copenhagen has to offer.

Absolutely fantastic large 2V, 109 m2 penthouse apartment in Gemini Residence "Silo" is rented out.

The apartment is at the top of the Gemini Residence.

This apartment has no residency requirement and is perfect as a commuter apartment for people who work in Copenhagen but have permanent residence elsewhere.

(Historically, all new apartments have been without a residency requirement until the first person registers their residence and the apartment will then always be with a residency requirement. Copenhagen has stopped with a residency requirement. Apartments without a residency requirement make it possible to use the apartment and have an address registered at another address. I plan to live abroad one day in the future and live in this apartment when I stay in Denmark for some periods. Therefore, the apartment must still be without a residency requirement).

With the apartment can be included in private parking space with private electric charger in the basement, approx. 10 meters from the glass elevator. Parking space costs DKK 1,000.00 per day. month.

Rented fully equipped and furnished with new design furniture. All equipment for bedroom, kitchen and bathroom is in the apartment. All kitchen furniture is included. Large balcony with a look all over the Ã˜resund and Copenhagen.

Super central, within walking distance to the metro, the harbor bath and the charming "old" brew with cafes, small specialty shops, etc. In addition, close to City Hall Square, Christianshavn. The shopping center Fisketorvet is located just across the other side with access via bicycle bridge.

Large living room with design sofa arrangement, new large TV, broadband internet, dining table with design chairs, well integrated with nice and complete bright luxury kitchen with all equipment (plates, pots, glass etc.). Everything for the bedroom is included, including duvets, pillows and sheets, etc.

Note: The apartment can potentially also be rented unfurnished.

Large bedroom with wardrobe.

Lovely bathroom with washing machine and dryer. Shower with glass door.

In short, nothing is missing before moving in.

I am responsible for the practical payment of electricity, TV, internet and heat, etc., so you have to do nothing but move in with your personal belongings and simply pay monthly rent.

Possibility of borrowing free kayaks in properties.

Write a little about yourself, number of residents, wanted rental period and wanted time to move in.

Viewing can be arranged at anytime you wish, but preferably Saturday or Sunday from 2:00 PM.

Please do not hesistate to write to me or send an sms

Best regards Soren

title: Bright Apartment with Floor Heating
description:
(English Description can be found at bottom) 

I forlÃ¦ngelse af Gentoftegade ligger Kongelysvej, en lille blind vej , godt beskyttet mod Lyngbyvejens trafik og stÃ¸j, men samtidig nÃ¦r til alt , herunder busser, tog, indkÃ¸b og postkontor. 

Ejendommen er fra 1937 og den blev i 2003/4 gennemrenoveret fra kÃ¦lder til kvist med nyindretning af ejerlejligheder. Ny maling fra 2025. Lejligheden der er pÃ¥ 119 m2 og 4 vÃ¦relser, er enkelt og funktionelt disponeret, med et moderne og tiltalende prÃ¦g . Der er hÃ¸jt til loftet i alle rum, aske parket pÃ¥ gulvene og gulvvarme overalt. Fra entreen gÃ¥r man gennem en glasdÃ¸r ind i den ca. 45 m2 store dagligstue, der pÃ¥ elegant vis er i Ã¥ben kontakt med det moderne kÃ¸kken udfÃ¸rt med Hanstholm elementer og mahogni bordplade. Stuen som er det naturlige samlingspunkt i lejligheden har forbindelse til den store sydvest vendte altan pÃ¥ ca 10 m2, sovevÃ¦relset med indbyggede skabe og det ene af de 2 bÃ¸rnevÃ¦relser. Det andet bÃ¸rnevÃ¦relse, samt det store badevÃ¦relse med bord af granit tilgÃ¥s fra entreen. 

Alle hÃ¥rde hvidevarer medfÃ¸lger (komfur, ovn, kÃ¸l, frys, opvask, vask og tÃ¸rretumbler).
Til lejligheden hÃ¸rer egen parkeringsplads og eget kÃ¦lderrum, foruden del i fÃ¦lles
kÃ¦lderrum. Ejendommen er omkranset af bÃ¸gehÃ¦k og lindetrÃ¦er.

Som udlejere har vi haft flere lejere gennem Ã¥rene, altid med gensidig respekt, og alle har forladt huset tilfredse. Her er, hvad en tidligere lejer skrev:

"Endnu en gang vil jeg gerne udtrykke min dybfÃ¸lte taknemmelighed for jeres vedvarende stÃ¸tte gennem Ã¥rene og for at vÃ¦re sÃ¥ venlige og imÃ¸dekommende udlejere. "
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In continuation of Gentoftegade, Kongelysvej, a small blind road, is well protected from Lyngbyvejens traffic and noise, but at the same time close to everything, including buses, trains, shopping and post office. The property is from 1937 and it was refurbished from basement to roof in 2003/4 with new features of condominiums. New Paint from 2025.  

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. The another children\'s room, as well as the large bathroom with granite table accessed from the entrance hall. 

All White goods included (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, all in one washing machine and tumble dryer). The apartment has its own car park and own cellar, in addition to shared facilities basement. The property is surrounded by beech hedges and linden trees.

As landlord, I have hosted several tenants over the years, always with mutual respect, and all have left the house satisfied. Hereâ€™s what one of my former tenants had to say:

"Once again, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support over the years and for being such a kind and friendly landlord. "

title: Spacious 4 rooms new 128 m2 apartment
description:
The apartment is on the 11th floor with a south-west facing living room and a spacious balcony - it gives a beautiful view directly over the city and parks!

You enter a beautiful and spacious entrance hall, which gives access to your large living room with an open kitchen. 
The entrance also gives access to a guest toilet/bathroom and a spacious bedroom that could be a guest bedroom or bed room for grown up kids. 
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in closet and attached toilet/bathroom and washing machine & dryer.
In addition, there is a small room besides master bedroom, which could be used as a child room or study/work room or simply as an extension of the living room. 

The area is surrounded by beautiful parks and gardens for a walk, jog, or a family picnic - JC Jacobsens Have, Enghave Parken, SÃ¸ndermarken, and Frederiksberg Have.

For families with children, there are many good children institutions right in the backyard and the famous European School Copenhagen is at a walkable distance. There are lots of wonderful playgrounds, free time activity centers for children, sports/fitness centers nearby. Copenhagen Zoo is like 15-20 minutes walk from the apartment - yes, we could go on.

There are 3 big supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Resturants, rooftop bars, cafes, bakeries, spa, shops are all located within 5 minutes walk. 

The apartment location is super convenient, you can easily take S-Train (Carlsberg Byen Station), Buses, and Metro-train (Enghave Plads Metro). Within 5 minutes you can reach Central Train station and Tivoli. 

The apartment comes with a big storage room in the basement. 
There is paid Car parking available very conveniently under the apartment tower. 

The apartment is rented out for a maximum of 24 months (with a possibility to renew), but less duration can also be agreed.

NOTE: 
- THE PHOTOS ARE OF A MODEL APARTMENT.
- VIDEO is representative of same size apartment in the building, from a higher floor

title: 3 vÃ¦relses lejlighed pÃ¥ Islands Brygge i KÃ¸benhavn S udlejes
description:
Gemini er latin og betyder tvillinger, og det giver jo meget god mening, nÃ¥r man ser pÃ¥ den gamle frÃ¸silo pÃ¥ Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, kaldes siloen i dag, som nok er mere siamesiske tvillinger end bare tvillinger, for siloerne i den gamle sojakagefabrik fletter sig ind i hinanden i et arkitektonisk mestervÃ¦rk. 84 lejligheder er her, alle bygget uden pÃ¥ siloerne, og de kunne ikke ligge bedre i deres eget 8-tal lige ved Bryggebroen og lige over for Fisketorvet.Â Â 
Alle 143 m2 er vendt mod vandet. Det samme er terrassen, der er lang som lejligheden og har sol fra morgen til aften. Gemini Residence stod fÃ¦rdig i 2005. Det indvendige af 8-tallet er en tom skal med foyer, trapper og elevator, og det hele ligger under et gennemsigtigt tag. Det er nytÃ¦nkning, der vil noget. Kvarteret med den gamle sojakagefabrik er omdÃ¸bt til Havnestad, hvor en del af de gamle bygninger enten er restaureret eller ombygget. Gemini Residence, Pressesiloen, Zeppelinerhallen og Wennbergsiloen er nogle af dem. 
De er alle bÃ¸rn af et slidt, industrielt omrÃ¥de, men Islands Brygge har de sidste snart 25 Ã¥r udviklet sig til det mest hippe og eftertragtede kvarter. Fra at vende ryggen til vandet, vender det i dag krop og ansigt mod KÃ¸benhavn pÃ¥ den anden side af vandet. Kreativ byplanlÃ¦gning med havnebad og promenadeliv gÃ¸r, at Bryggen og Havnestad i dag stÃ¥r som et raffineret miks af moderne byliv med nÃ¦rmiljÃ¸, cafÃ©er og lÃ¦kre butikker. Byens bedste kulturtilbud er lige pÃ¥ den anden side af vandet. Bryggen har rammerne, som med broer og havnebus forbinder det bedste af alt. 
Ledige P-pladser er der ikke mange af pÃ¥ Bryggen, men som lejer fÃ¸lger der en parkeringsplads med. Den ligger under ejendommen med elevator op til lejligheden. Det er ikke biler, der dominerer Bryggen, det er cykler og ladcykler derimod, pÃ¥ cykelstier med indkÃ¸bsposer, bÃ¸rn og kÃ¦rester som uskyldsrene passagerer pÃ¥ ladet.
â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
Gemini is Latin and means twins, and it makes a lot of sense when you look at the old seed silo at Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, as the silo is called today, is probably more Siamese twins than just twins, because the silos in the old soy cake factory intertwine in an architectural masterpiece. There are 84 apartments here, all built on the outside of the silos, and they couldnâ€™t be better located right by Bryggebroen and right across from Fisketorvet.
All 143 m2 face the water. So does the terrace, which is as long as the apartment and has sun from morning to evening. Gemini Residence was completed in 2005. The inside of the silos is an empty shell with a foyer, stairs and elevator, and itâ€™s all under a transparent roof. Itâ€™s innovation that matters. The neighborhood with the old soy cake factory has been renamed Havnestad, where some of the old buildings have either been restored or rebuilt. 
in the last 25 years Islands Brygge has developed into the hippest and most sought-after neighborhood. From turning its back on the water, it now faces Copenhagen on the other side of the water. Creative urban planning with a harbor bath and promenade means that Bryggen and Havnestad today stand as a refined mix of modern city life with local environment, cafes and delicious shops. The cityâ€™s best cultural offerings are just on the other side of the water. Bryggen has the framework that, with bridges and the harbor bus, connects the best of everything.
There are not many vacant parking spaces at Bryggen, but as a tenant, a parking space is included. It is located under the property with an elevator up to the apartment.

Parkering â€“ Ja 
Husdyr â€“ Nej
Elevator â€“ Ja

title: Spacious Furnished Studio 400m from Nordhavn Metro (Studio XL w. Kitchen)
description:
ğŸ  Welcome to Nordhavn, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life - you can swim in the harbor baths nearby, go to a cafÃ© or visit the BigBio Cinema just around the corner. Situated in the vibrant Nordhavn neighborhood, this area boasts an array of shops and cafes, with the convenience of a Rema supermarket just a short 300-meter stroll away. RÃ¥dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 10 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligstÃ¸tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 

The studio is equipped with: 
â—† one bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 
â—† desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 
â—† storage cabinet 
â—† wall-mounted shelving 
â—† ceiling lamp 
â—† roller blinds 
â—† wardrobe with a mirror inside 
â—† fully equipped kitchen (oven, fridge & a small freezer compartment and kitchen cupboard with an extractor fan) 
â—† private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.    


Free access to shared areas in the building complex: 
â—† access to common lobby, reading room, bookable meeting rooms 
â—† free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
â—† roof terrace and courtyard garden 
â—† laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex: 
â—† Located in UMEUS Nordhavn, on Helsinkigade 
â—† Proximity to Nordhavn Metro (400 meters away) - 10 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
â—† Rema supermarket 300m away from your doorstep 
â—† 300m away from Sandkaj Harbour bath, where the boardwalk, the cafÃ©s and bathing guests create a lovely beach vibe. 

Live in a place with a wonderful community: 
â—† Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
â—† Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  
The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life â€“ here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over the water. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ğŸ¤ğŸ  Reach out to arrange a viewing! 

*Note: there is only 1 bed in this studio, suitable for couples if 2 tenants occupy it.

title: Stunning Copenhagen apartment with amazing water view
description:
Available from: 1/11-2024

This is one of the best water views over Copenhagen. This 6th floor apartment offers a generous 93 m2 living space split in two bedrooms, a hallway, an open kitchen and living room and one large bathroom. 

A high quality kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures in the bath and quality hard wood floors To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 29 m2 balcony with planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. 

Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

We are renting the apartment out 1-2 year with possibility for extension.

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

E N G E L S K 

Lovely fully furnished apartment in an attractive property on 2 levels of 120 sq m. is for subletting for a shorter period min. 1 month and max. 6 months.

The apartment is available by arrangement.

Do you need an apartment in beautiful surroundings in Gentofte Municipality for a shorter or longer period, min. 1 month and max. 6 months? This is the right apartment, and you only need to bring your personal belongings, as the apartment contains all furnishings, bedding, linen, etc.

There is also free parking and internet at the property.

The monthly rent is DKK 25.000,- plus consumption of water + heating + electricity.

There is free internet and TV signal

The apartment is rented for a period from a minimum of 1 month, and a maximum of 6 months. all by agreement, and will be suitable for Danish/Foreign companies that need housing for employees, as well as insurance companies that need to rehouse a family, or others who need an apartment for a shorter period.

The apartment is located in Gentofte, on an attractive residential street, within walking distance of Gentofte SÃ¸ & Nymosen. The property also has a view of the city and is close to Greater Copenhagen. With S-train to Greater Copenhagen in 17 minutes.

The apartment is on the 2nd floor, and contains a living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, small kitchen, and large outdoor terrace, fully furnished with rattan furniture, etc.

Large, beautiful bathroom with underfloor heating, washing machine, dryer, etc.

The kitchen has a stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, fridge/freezer, and all cutlery, etc.

The apartment is fully furnished, and there is also a large flat screen TV, with Netflix, Disney, etc.

In the bedrooms there are 2 large double beds, + cot and high chair 0-2 years.

There is also an extra sofa bed with space for 2 people on the 2nd floor.
Thus, there are sleeping places for a total of up to max. 6 people

In the living room there are 2 leather sofas, sideboard, lamps, coffee table and much more.

In the dining room there is a dining table with 6 chairs, wardrobe etc.

The apartment is located in a beautiful property with half-timbering and high ceilings with an area of â€‹â€‹approx. 120 sq m. on 2 floors.

As mentioned, the apartment is fully furnished and ready to move into.
The only thing you need is your personal belongings.

The apartment can be rented for a short period of min. 1 month and max. 6 months. depending on your needs.

The apartment is on 2 levels, (1st + 2nd floor), and has a great view of Gentofte and the surrounding area.

It is only a few minutes' walk to the S-Train and buses. Several supermarkets in the area as well as several nurseries, kindergartens and several schools.

Distance to Gentofte Hospital, less than 2 km. Lyngby DTU, about 5 km.

Copenhagen is 9 km from Gentofte, and Kastrup Airport 16 km. from the property.

If you have any questions, please contact me.
